title: Elegant Holiday Ham Glaze
ingredients: Juice and grated peel of 1 orange|Juice and grated peel of 1 lemon|1 c Sweet red wine, OR cranberry juice|1/2 c Light corn syrup|1/2 ts Dry mustard|1 cn (16 ounce) whole-berry cranberry sauce|Drippings from a baked ham, optional|2 tb Cornstarch, optional|2 tb Cold water, optional
instructions: In a saucepan, combine orange and lemon juices and peel, wine or cranberry juice, corn syrup and mustard. Simmer for 30 minutes. Add the cranberry sauce and ham drippings, if desired; heat through. If a thicker glaze is desired, bring just to a boil. Combine cornstarch and water; add to glaze. Cook and stir until slightly thickened. Serve warm over sliced ham. Yield; 3 1/2
